text: Looking ahead, we expect continued growth in our cloud services, although we are mindful of macroeconomic uncertainties that could impact customer spending. Our future success depends on our ability to innovate and compete effectively in a rapidly changing technological landscape. Regulatory risks in various jurisdictions may also affect our operations.

We believe our investments in AI will drive future growth, but the competitive environment is intense. We anticipate challenges in ad revenue growth due to market saturation and evolving privacy regulations. Our outlook is subject to risks including geopolitical tensions and potential changes in consumer behavior.

Our guidance for the next quarter reflects our confidence in our product pipeline. However, our performance is subject to supply chain disruptions and component shortages, which could materially affect our results. We also face significant competition in every market we operate in, which may impact our margins.
